title: L20 â€¢ story
intro:
At the Hotel
"We want a room on the first floor," I said.
"Certainly, sir," the hotel manager answered.
"Have you a room with a private bathroom?" I asked.
"Yes, sir," the hotel manager said. "Here are the keys to number twenty-one."
I took the keys, and my wife and I went upstairs.
We unlocked the door of room twenty-one and went into the room.
We shut the door and put our cases on the floor.
"Listen!" my wife said. "There's a man in this room. He's singing."
"You're right!" I said. "He's in the bathroom!"
I knocked at the door of the bathroom. The singing stopped.
"Who is it?" a voice said.
"This is our room," I answered. "What are you doing here?"
"Your room!" the voice answered angrily. "This is my room. Please go away. I'm taking a bath."
"I'll call the manager," my wife said.
Just then, the door opened, and the manager came in.
"I'm very sorry," he said. "I made a mistake. Your room is next door. Here are the keys to number twenty-two."

items.prompt: Do you want a room on the first floor?
Is there a room with a private bathroom?
Did the manager give you the keys?
Didn't you go upstairs?
Did you go into room twenty-one?
Is there a man in the bathroom?
Will your wife call the manager?
Wasn't the manager sorry?
Didn't the manager make a mistake?
Is your room next door?
Did the manager give you the keys to number twenty-two?
Do you want a room on the first floor or on the ground floor?
items.answer: I want a room on the first floor but I don't want a room on the ground floor.

items.prompt: Did the manager give you the keys to room twenty-one or room twenty-two?
items.answer: He gave me the keys for room 21 but he didn't give me the keys for room 22.

items.prompt: Did you and your wife go upstairs or did you stay downstairs?
items.answer: We went upstairs but we didn't stay downstairs.

items.prompt: Is the stranger in the bathroom or in the bedroom?
items.answer: The stranger is in the bathroom but the stranger is not in the bedroom.

items.prompt: Is this your room or is it the stranger's room?
items.answer: It is the stranger's room but it isn't our room.

items.prompt: Will your wife call the manager or will you call him?
items.answer: My wife will call the manager but I will not call the manager.

items.prompt: Did the manager come upstairs or did your wife go downstairs?
items.answer: The manager came upstairs but my wife didn't go downstairs.

items.prompt: Which keys did the manager give you?
Where did you and your wife go?
items.answer: We went upstairs to room twenty-one.

items.prompt: Whose room was this?
What is the stranger doing in the bathroom?
Why is the hotel manager sorry?
items.answer: Because he made a mistake and gave us the wrong room keys.
